Package net.matrixcreations.worldTemplateAPI

Class WorldTemplateAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.matrixcreations.worldTemplateAPI.WorldTemplateAPI
  • public class WorldTemplateAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    The WorldTemplateAPI class provides methods for creating, loading, and deleting world templates in a Minecraft server using the Bukkit API and Multiverse-Core.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      WorldTemplateAPI​(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin)
      Constructs a WorldTemplateAPI instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> createTemplateFromWorld​(java.lang.String worldName, java.lang.String templateName)
      Creates a template from an existing world by copying its files to the template directory.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> deleteTemplate​(java.lang.String templateName)
      Deletes a template world from the template directory.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<org.bukkit.World> loadTemplate​(java.lang.String templateName, java.lang.String targetWorldName)
      Loads a world from a template stored in the custom template directory.
      void setTemplateDirectory​(java.nio.file.Path directory)
      Allows the developer to specify a custom directory for storing world templates.

    • Method Detail

      • setTemplateDirectory

        public void setTemplateDirectory​(java.nio.file.Path directory)
        Allows the developer to specify a custom directory for storing world templates.
        Parameters:
        directory - the Path to the custom template directory

      • createTemplateFromWorld

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> createTemplateFromWorld​(java.lang.String worldName,
                                                                                         java.lang.String templateName)
        Creates a template from an existing world by copying its files to the template directory.
        Parameters:
        worldName - the name of the world to copy from
        templateName - the name for the new template directory
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture indicating success or failure

      • loadTemplate

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<org.bukkit.World> loadTemplate​(java.lang.String templateName,
                                                                             java.lang.String targetWorldName)
        Loads a world from a template stored in the custom template directory.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template to load
        targetWorldName - the name for the newly created world
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture containing the loaded World instance, or an exception if failed

      • deleteTemplate

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> deleteTemplate​(java.lang.String templateName)
        Deletes a template world from the template directory.
        Parameters:
        templateName - the name of the template to delete
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture indicating success or failure
